website_summaries.verdict: Dragon NaturallySpeaking 13 Premium is high-end, and expensive, dictation software. You can use it to compose orally, navigate the Web with just your voice, and more. It's not an impulse buy, but if you are committed to learning the art of dictation, it's fast, efficient, and thorough in what it can do.
pros: Picks up on your language style by scanning emails, Gmail, and Google Docs
cons: Chrome not as well supported as Internet Explorer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: This version will not be supported starting 1/1/2019!!!
customer_reviews.text: I JUST bought this version in June, and now I get a message saying it will no longer be supported starting 1/1/2019, but I can upgrade to Dragon Professional Individual 15 for the 'low' price of $99?! So, I bought the software and got less than one year of support. What a ripoff! You're better off just buying Dragon Professional Individual 15, assuming you can trust this company not to just do that same down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeky Monkey

customer_reviews.title: I wasted valuable time trying to install on my computer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Nuance Dragon Naturally Speaking Premium Version 13. I received the product early 01/12/2017 through Amazon Prime. Amazon provided fast delivery as usual! I wasted valuable time trying to install on my computer. The installation caused my computer to freeze 4 times, and after 6 hours of waiting for the installation to complete I had to call it a day. I was up early 01/13/2017 and tried to contact Nuance, no luck it's as time wasting as the installation. I have never had a problem installing a product onto my computer, simple task. It is the end of day two and have invested another 7 hours. I'm DONE, WTH Nuance? I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only buy it if you have to.  Lousy developer.
customer_reviews.text: Nuance really needs to update this program!! It's been almost 3 years since the last version improvement. I've been using Dragon NaturallySpeaking for many years, over 20, and the program still needs a lot of work. I have a real love/hate relationship with it because it makes a lot of stupid mistakes. It still does not take adequate advantage of multi-core CPUs or of vast amounts of memory like it should. This program needs to learn how to utilize system resources if they are available. Come on Nuance get it together. Your programmers turn out the same old thing with only minor improvements over decades of development, yet claim vast improvements with each release. You need some good competition.
customer_reviews.author: FALCON

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. I wish I could get mine back.
customer_reviews.text: I got this software to write novels more efficiently. Maybe I haven't given it enough time to "learn" me, but that is half the battle. It is so slow to use with Word and wouldn't pick up anything I said. I was not using the recommended plantronics headset, but a cheaper blue tooth. So, I got the recommended headset. Still don't know if it helps because the program still opens at a snails pace and now won't let me use it in word. I don't know what is going on but this program has been useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: D.L. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wasted hours and never worked
customer_reviews.text: I've spent over 6 hours on the phone with customer service as well as giving my computer for 2 days to the IT department at my work and they still can't get it to run. It's been able to install onto the computer and then crashes. Everyone I've talked to that has this software has had terrible experience with getting it to work. It's supposedly good if you can ever get it working but doesn't seem to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: bebo

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for dictation and for transcription of recorded speech. Very unreliable difficult to use. Inconsistent results and application Behavior. Frustrating. A large amount of time was committed to training it by multiple people.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dad

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Will not allow profile activation since the mic will not turn on. Many similar complaints on internet especially with Windows 10. Nuance wants $99.00 to fix the problem. Do not buy this product! Here is Nuance stand on support: "...Nuance has a PAY FOR SUPPORT POLICY..."
customer_reviews.author: boyd malloy

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it's GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps locking up my computer. I don't know what it's doing, but I'll be in the middle of my dictation, and it will just stop. And then it locks up my computer. I gave it more time. I've restarted my computer three times. I've had to close down Word eight times in the last two hours. It's great when it works. It's amazing. I love it. But for the 10 minutes I save using this, I lose 20 minutes. I'm annoyed. Really annoyed and I'm returning the program to get my money back. This is stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Truly a waste of money. Hours invested in attempting to get it to recognize and transcribe my voice. Still don't have a single sentence correctly transcribed. Should've just been typing. I'd probably have 10,000 words in my draft by now. Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful program
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Dragon, off and on, since Dragon NaturallySpeaking 8. Back then, you had to read a whole bunch of text to get it working, and even then the recognition was a little wonky. Now, you install it, read one paragraph to set up the microphone, and it works very well (not perfectly, but very well). Admittedly, I have the common Northern US accent, and I'm sure that makes it work better for me than some others. But speech recognition has come a long way. This is a resource-intensive program, so if you're using a laptop, be warned: make sure your processor speed is adequate! I've installed it on my desktop, because my laptop couldn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom'n'Writer

customer_reviews.title: This program works terribly!!
customer_reviews.text: This program works terribly!!! It crashes all the time, requests a key as if I downloaded it instead of using the CD and I am truly dissatisfied. I tried technical support and they tried to sell me $90 year support and wouldn't help unless I paid the $90.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anne Friday

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME vendor, great value but Nuance needs lessons in customer service...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product previously as I have RSI and have been recently unemployed so funds are tight. I bought an older version from a dealer on Amazon but when I called Nuance they very rudely would not support it and said the vendor was not unauthorized re-seller (untrue) and they would only support me if I paid another $200 to get the latest version. Not even with a tinge of sympathy or understanding, quite rude actually. All from a foreign call center with poor English. I am thrilled that Alexa, Google and others are creating almost free and superior software.
customer_reviews.author: FunGus

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with MS Word 2016
customer_reviews.text: For the price it does not work well. Program installed fine, cannot get it to hook up with new version of MS Word, the prime reason I purchased it. Costumer Service for this company does not exist. They are terrible. Cannot get through, cannot understand the person I talked to. Sorry that I purchased it. I also purchased a new head set because their CS person said that may be the problem and it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Zoeller

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this - worse than free speech to text that comes with Windows
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Was working ok with Windows 8 and then after upgrade to 10 it doesn't recognize speech from the microphone supplied. All hardware identical. Other apps work fine with it (Skype, Windows Speech to text) so figured it wasn't the mic. Customer services said its a driver conflict. Reinstalled Windows sound drivers. Then tried reinstalling software. No improvement. Tried with a USB mic instead and the response time is extremely slow for speech and the accuracy is appalling. Not worth the effort. Dragon won't offer refund. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: drsellicks

customer_reviews.title: a ludicrous headache
customer_reviews.text: I needed this software for work following an arm injury. Unfortunately, it has caused so many more frustrations from basic use then just attempting to type with one hand. The free voice recognition software on my phone works 500 times better. Sometimes I cannot believe how wrong it hears the words that I am saying, and going back to revise everything is incredibly time-consuming. Additionally, it has strange little pop-ups that get in the way of text that I am trying to read or click on. As it is, I am now just sticking to my phone, and emailing text to my work computer so that I don't have to use this software.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kate

customer_reviews.title: Can't rate it until it works.
customer_reviews.text: After trying again I had to revise my review. This is a useless program as it will not recogonize the microphone that came with it. The microphone works with my windows 10 and everything else but not Premium 13. Can't really rate it until the program works. I installed the recommended additional software but it caused my computer to fail to reboot. Fortunately I have a recovery disk or it would have killed my computer.
customer_reviews.author: colonelk

customer_reviews.title: What a ripoff !!
customer_reviews.text: Nuance no longer supports this product 40 days after Amazon sold it to me. What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support Expires in 4 Months !!! Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: Installed Dragon v13 on my laptop and as soon as I did a disclaimer popped up saying they aint gonna support it after 12/31/18.. But for $99 I can buy the suite version which will be supported....want my money back now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm still learning to use it properly and to best advantage, but I can tell this sophisticated software ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning to use it properly and to best advantage, but I can tell this sophisticated software is going to help an aging arthritic academic take research notes from my readings and eventually get back to writing again. I am so grateful! Highly recommended for anyone who finds typing cumbersome (due to physical disability or any other reason). It also facilitates, which I am not as interested in, interactive voice connections between your computer, the Web, email, facebook, etc. So for people who are often on computer and want to save time--this is just the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: DICTATE...DICTATE...DICTATE...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time purchasing Dragon Dictation. I first started using the software while working on my Master's degree and haven't looked back. I bought this as a replacement to the old software which just did not work well due to updates to the product. Glad I did! Some great updates have been added and it works well. I also have the Mac version and mobile version. I cannot say enough about how much easier it is to dictate your documents instead of typing. You can get them done in half the time and save your back and hands in the process. I am now using it to write my first book. It is a life-saver!
customer_reviews.author: Boesh7678

customer_reviews.title: Notice of Discontinuation by Nuance A. P.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in July 2018. I have just received an email from Nuance Asia Pacific that this product is to be discontinued, withdrawn from market and no further support from Nuance. We, therefore, have to purchase Dragon Professional Individual 15. I see you still sell this item. Advice, please.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Still cannot get it to work. I'm blind and wanted this to help me navigate my laptop, however after installing it I've had all my tech savvy friends try to get it to work for me to no avail. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Danny R. Barela

customer_reviews.title: I hate to say
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say, but even 25 years later it still doesn't hear me and I end up having to do way too many post dictation corrections. I get better quality with my smart phone email program. Dictate and email the text to myself, insert into Word and away I go. $300 I could have spent more wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a writer, you must have this
customer_reviews.text: I am a writer. This has dramatically improved the time it takes me to write an article. Don't forget the Voice Tracer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well, but the installation is very difficult
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product with a recommendation from someone else. They had trouble getting it installed in the reviews said it was difficult to install. Most Windows programs install easily so I assumed it was something that they were doing wrong. They weren't. Installation is a disaster for this product. It will not let you install if you are the administrator on the desktop. I had to create a new user that was not an administrator and then import all the applications and settings to the new user. It took hours. Otherwise, it seems to work okay. It seems superior to the speech recognition program built into windows.
customer_reviews.author: kcpilotpat

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Dollars
customer_reviews.text: The Premium 13 voice recognition is seriously flawed. I attempted to use it in an effort to better track my billing descriptions at the law firm I work. No matter how many times I annunciate some words, it always spells a totally different word. The same happens when I use the vocabulary feature. I was told by one of our IT staff that I need to purchase the more expensive version in order to truly appreciate the software. I'm debating if I want to spend the money in order to achieve my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Moore

customer_reviews.title: I hate to have to send it back
customer_reviews.text: I am frustrated by my new Dragon! I have Windows 10 and the download went well, but when I try to use it, it tells me the sound quality is too low. I have followed every written direction I could find, and the problem remains. I believe the headset that was sent with it is defective, but cannot locate how to contact the company directly to ask about the problem. I hate to have to send it back ............ but what else can I do?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Dragon Naturally Speaking Premium. Very difficult to get it to work. Customer Service was no help what so ever. Stay away from Dragon Naturally Speaking Premium.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: It makes a lot of mistakes. Me: " ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes a lot of mistakes. Me:" It was too long of a wait." Dragon:" It was two long of a wait." If you talk too fast, it makes more mistakes than usual.You just have to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Grueter

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get this program loaded on the computer. It starts to load...(takes forever) and when it's almost loaded it says" there was an error and can't continue!" Arrg!!! I did this about 5 times. and every time it did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Clover

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Terrible Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the newer versions are any better, but this was absolutely atrocious. I bought it when my keyboard crapped out on me and I didn't want to buy a new laptop. The voice recognition is garbage, it doesn't do punctuation correctly, and when I tried uninstalling it, it caused further problems and would not delete all the files, despite selecting the option to delete it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price I would expecct better quality, i have better luck using apple note
customer_reviews.text: purchased this program for work, while in the middle of report it locked up and I lost my work, can't get a hold of customer support so I san instal on another pc. while trying to complete a complex report it interrupts wanting to connect to internet,. For the price I would expecct better quality , i have better luck using apple note,
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I actually find Premium 13 to be the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I actually find Premium 13 to be the best one yet. If I were to recommend to someone looking for an excellent dictation program, it would DEFINITELY be this one.
customer_reviews.author: Moonscythe

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst software I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst software I've ever purchased. Most of the application on my laptop are not compatible with Dragon and their feature are no different that Window's accessibility featured, built into the operating system. I spent more time attempting to train the software and correcting the repeated error...until finally I stopped using this.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Works well, especially compared to the version I received ten years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Software works as advertised. I first received DNS in 2007 as a gift. Good, but not good enough to use regularly. This new version is (as one would expect after a decade of improvement) much, much better. Unfortunately, the recent Windows 10 update has broken it somehow and I can't find my installation disk to attempt a reinstall. I recommend you get a better headset. It would be great if the "file transfer" option could process multiple audio files at once.
customer_reviews.author: JPDillon

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it sounds
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month and a half. Forces crashes of Microsoft Word and Excel that necessitate system reboots multiple times per day. If you call Nuance they tell you it's Microsoft's problem. If you call Microsoft they tell you to disable Dragon. Back up your profile often as you will be restoring it regularly for as long as the product lasts.
customer_reviews.author: JustAMama

customer_reviews.title: This version works really good--not as good as the latest version but good enough
customer_reviews.text: The Dragon Naturally Speaking was easy to install and quick to get started. The headphones are nice. The price was reasonable. I was glad to find them since the newer version is so expensive and I needed more than one copy for different work areas. I am glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wyrick

customer_reviews.title: It is great when it works
customer_reviews.text: It is great when it works, but get wonky and has to be reloaded repeatedly, becoming more trouble than it is worth. Upgraded to Professional 14, and it is no better. I have use it with Windows 7 and 10, more problems on 10 with Dragon, looking for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to give even one star. Don’t waste your money. Installation instructions were not easy to follow. Even after following the instructions, I still couldn’t get the software to work. I had to take off work so I could call them for technical assistance. I’m not sure where the technical support folks are located, but they don’t speak English very well. Unfortunately, the return window has passed, and I’m stuck with software I can’t use.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Out of date
customer_reviews.text: Nuance no longer supports Dragon NaturallySpeaking in any version including 13. So the install failed. Only solution is to 1. Buy the Professional version 2. Install an out of date version of Windows that still has msxlm4.msi which isn't even used now even though Microsoft has ads for it or its replacement. I want a refund. I'm late because of days of wasted time with customer support (non-support) from MS and Nuance.
customer_reviews.author: John L Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It works fine on my PC and also when I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine on my PC and also when I use it in conjunction with a Philips DPM7000 recorder. The recorder has special software (Speechexec) that interfaces with Dragon. With this combination I can record with a mike on my PC, and then when away from my PC I record on the DPM7000. Back at my PC I upload the recording from the recorder to Speechexec, which passes the recording to Dragon. Although I have a accent in my speech, the Dragon training feature allows Dragon to learn my speech patterns. I use Dragon then to fix any errors in the recording (I could do it via the keyboard) using Dragon so that Dragon is continually being trained.
customer_reviews.author: d. d. reyn

customer_reviews.title: ... an older version of Dragon naturally speaking and I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of Dragon naturally speaking and I like it a lot, after purchasing NaturallySpeaking premium voice recognition has increased 95%. This is an absolutely fabulous program it helps me to write a letter much faster and easier and with more accuracy. I am a disabled person, I have been a quadriplegic for 27 years and this is absolutely necessary for me to use writing letters in a business setting.
customer_reviews.author: David LeTendre

customer_reviews.title: If You Really Want To Buy This Product, Just Burn $120 Instead, For The Same Effect
customer_reviews.text: Don't take a chance unless you just randomly feel like wasting whatever the price for this useless product. Install failed. After reading the horror stories, I don't even want to bother calling Nuance customer service. I really don't have several days to waste on this effort. Planning to try using Adobe instead. Also, because I didn't immediately install, I am beyond the date for an Amazon refund. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Avid User

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than Naturally Speaking 12.5
customer_reviews.text: High accuracy, decent speed. Installation was trouble-free and took less than 25 minutes. Caveat: I exactly followed all of the instructions in Baker's "A Writer's Guide to Training Your Dragon."
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: I continue to be amazed at how accurate it is in speech recognition
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my office routinely, even though I have a secretary. I continue to be amazed at how accurate it is in speech recognition. I used an earlier version which was also quite good, but it keeps getting better. I wish I could make the time to more fully explore its many functions. Each time I learn a new one, it makes me realize how feature rich this is for not a bad price. Once you incorporate this into your work flow, you'll realize what a help it is to efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Backpkrs2

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! I love the fact that you don’t have to share your work with a third party for ‘improvement’ purposes. More accurate than other programs I’ve tried. I only regret that I didn’t opt for the package with the Bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: UK mystery lover

customer_reviews.title: Ideal software for maximizing efficiency!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that I resisted using dictation software for quite a while, believing that I type almost as fast as I speak. Boy was I wrong! I am a clinical psychologist, and I use Dragon Naturally Speaking to dictate case notes and assessment reports. Although there are occasional mistakes that need correcting before finalizing the documents, overall it is MUCH faster for me to dictate than to type. The software has built-in procedures to improve accuracy, so I suspect that the mistakes will become less frequent as I use the software more. Dragon has greatly improved my efficiency and I would definitely recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: thriftygal

customer_reviews.title: One of the best applications for the PC to ever come along.
customer_reviews.text: Speech recognition is one of the most useful tools ever invented to aid in the use of a computer. Whereas I can only type at about 60 words per minute, I can maintain over 100 words per minute with Dragon with much greater accuracy and much less effort. I use this all the time and I have been for years, starting with version 8. Each new version gets a little better; more accurate. I don't know why more people haven't embraced this technology.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hollander

customer_reviews.title: Serial Number Found
customer_reviews.text: Excellent software. I especially appreciate its relative accuracy and adaptability, because I used to take dictation and transcribe tapes myself, so I know how hard it is! By the way, I found the Serial Number on the paper work (silly me).
customer_reviews.author: V. Taylor, WORD SERVANT

customer_reviews.title: This software is amazingly good at learning your voice and getting all your dictation ...
customer_reviews.text: This software is amazingly good at learning your voice and getting all your dictation right. I actually got it to transcribe videos and it doesn't work for that since the voice I'm trying to transcribe isn't mine and once it learns one voice, unless you teach it another voice it can't just understand it out of the box. The other annoying thing, which has absolutely nothing to do with the product itself, is that the company kept sending me half price offers on the software after I'd already purchased it at full price. I can't see the value of that as a marketing strategy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Adrian

customer_reviews.title: tihis is dragons older version and works like all of the earlier versions
customer_reviews.text: before i bought this i bought the new dragon - i've never been offered a chance to review the new dragon despite having gotten it from amazon. my view of the new software is BEWARE OF THE NEW VERSION - it is neither friendly (IMHO) nor useful (IMHO) which explains why i bought this older version - which is as reliable and good as the several previous versions i have owned and used
customer_reviews.author: Eric Eccleston

customer_reviews.title: DISC was corrupt!
customer_reviews.text: By the time I was able to try this product I realized the disc was corrupt and it would not work. The window for me to return passed so it was a waste of money. My fault for not opening it sooner but make sure you check sooner than I did.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: uses a lot of RAM, need at least 8 if not more
customer_reviews.text: I'm no tech master, nowhere close. It said upon install that my laptop may run slow with this installed and I might need to upgrade RAM if possible. I went ahead thinking it mean this program would run slow. NO, my entire laptop, browsers, MS all came to an aggravating crawl. Meanwhile I discovered I'd need to buy a new computer to run this. :(
customer_reviews.author: TracyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No profanity...please!
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I don’t care about this software is that it does not like four letter words: If I say s**t, it will spell out ship. If I say f***, then you are out of luck! Nuance staff said this was done on purpose. Yet, if I type this in Microsoft Word, I don’t have that problem. Yes, you can train the software, but it rapidly forgets often. Otherwise, the software picks up on what I say quite fine!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Voice Recording Program
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dragon NaturallySpeaking for about 25 years and love it. The later versions are better at recognizing the correct words and training to the user's voice. It even knows if I have a stuffy nose! This program saved me when I had several years without clerical support. I simply dictated my letters and reports and made revisions as necessary, all using NaturallySpeaking. I highly recommend this program for voice dictation and note taking.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boerke

customer_reviews.title: it is useful as it does type faster than I do
customer_reviews.text: Their 'right out of the box accuracy' claim is questionable. They claim you can speak at a normal rate and it can keep up, but it can not. I had a prior version (about years ago) and the only improvement I find for home use is being able to open documents and web pages. If you don't mind having to SERIOUSLY proofread EVERYTHING, it is useful as it does type faster than I do. I actually find the 'talk to text' feature on my phone works better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Magyar

customer_reviews.title: saves me at least an hour a day in typing.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from one of the original versions. Was leery about the cost, but am sooooo glad I did. I'm using it to dictate this review now. I work in a healthcare setting and although this is not the medical version I was able to use many of my documents to improve the vocabulary and my style of writing that it would recognize. It has been fantastic. It is increased my charting throughput dramatically. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: bubblehead99

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Program is terrible with Windows 10 and not compatible with newest Word progs. Older Dragon versions work much better overall!
customer_reviews.author: Chad C.

customer_reviews.title: My expectations must have been too high.
customer_reviews.text: The software was very inaccurate out of the box. I speak American English with no strong regional accent. Even after training it for several hours and allowing it to analyze my documents and emails, Dragon often fails to understand simple words such as "thus." I severely injured my hand and use it to dictate my term papers. The interface feels clunky. Adding or training a word seems more difficult than it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Human from New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Love it works great and it's doing the job.
customer_reviews.text: I work on 2-3 computers at once. I leave my headset on for my windows machine and this just makes things much easier. My other machines are Linux and I don't think they have a version for Linx. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: traderjohn

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad package, but............
customer_reviews.text: I have 8.1 professional OS on my laptop, and Dragon worked very well. However, my wife has 8.1 Home OS on her laptop, and commands that work on my laptop don't work on hers. I bought it for her, as she has macular degeneration and doesn't see well enough read or type for herself. So, it was a disappointment that it was different on her laptop. Having said that, however, I am truly amazed at how well it translates my speech with very few errors.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Fee

customer_reviews.title: A WORTHLESS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT WORKED FOR A COUPLE DAYS AND THEN QUIT WORKING. AMAZON APPROVED THE RETURN AND I SPENT $8 SHIPPING IT BACK TO THEM, BUT THEY RENEGED ON THEIR PROMISE AND REFUSED TO PAY. I WILL NOW CLOSE MY AMAZON ACCOUNT AND NEVER BUY FROM THEM AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dragon saved me...surgery on my shoulder and school deadlines
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic program. I work as a firefighter/paramedic and I'm back in school to obtain another degree. I injured my shoulder on the job and I had surgery so I was unable to type and had deadlines for school papers that they wouldn't change. So enter my savior Dragon. Not only was I now able to write my paper I could do many other things I didn't even buy dragon for. The shoulder is getting better now and I'm still using dragon as a easier way to finish my papers. Who can't talk faster then they type?
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Z

customer_reviews.title: Solid voice to text capabilities
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review with Dragon naturally speaking premium 13. The installation was very simple and started using it within 10 minutes. For the most part, voice recognition is solid but I tend to use a very specific language that requires training for the software. The training capabilities are fine but there really is no simple way to do it other than to work your way through it.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Gladkowski

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with headset/microphone as it says in description
customer_reviews.text: In the description, it clearly says it comes with the microphone/headset and all that arrived was a box with a disc and instructions to load disc. My son has dyslexia and now we had to return this and order a new one from a different seller with the headset and it is delaying him using it at school.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Novy

customer_reviews.title: Artificial Intelligence Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This software can't be hailed as Awesome enough. The book and Headset I bought with it was the perfect ensemble to create one of the most amazing experiences in using technology. Deep Learning is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Chaz Merida

customer_reviews.title: Worked Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: After initial problems with activation (I later learned there was a problem with the product website that was eventually fixed) I discovered that it worked better than I expected. I have used earlier versions of this product and some kind of training was always required but this version worked right out of the box with no prior preparation needed. Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: JEF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: No training to speak of, takes in complex technological passages with ease; fast, keeps up really well. Occasional problems with getting hung up, but only 2-3 times in several months. PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS VERSION HAS BEEN SUPERCEDED BY V14!! (the upgrade for which is apparently not free)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Dragon takes time to learn - did it back in ...
customer_reviews.text: Dragon takes time to learn - did it back in 2000. Wanted to learn and use on a current assignment; however, it took over my computer adn I couldn't use Word in the traditional manner. Removed Dragon to permit me to develop the documents for the current assignment.
customer_reviews.author: TG Wells Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! My husband was a two finger hunt and peck typist. This has given him the freedom to accomplish his tasks quicker and will enable him to more fully explore his creative talents. We were thrilled that the software worked well with non-standard software packages like his home inspection software.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the transcibe feature
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Love the transcription feature. I bought an Olympus recorder, go for walks and write business plans and stuff - and when I get back to the house - I plug in, and Dragon types out all my words. Pretty darn nifty.
customer_reviews.author: Beachy Booky

customer_reviews.title: which is one of his great loves.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product for our 87 year old dad who has Parkinson's Disease. It's a bit of a learning curve, but this software allowed him to go back to writing, which is one of his great loves.
customer_reviews.author: Spanish Plum

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Does not work with all computer sound cards
customer_reviews.text: This product has never worked with my Windows 10 PC. I was finally able to reach customer service and find out why. If you don't have the preferred sound card in your computer, the microphone provided with the product does not work. At all. It would have been really nice if the product description was clear about this prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good software if you have patience and learn and use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: I use Dragon to write stories and essays. As a blind person I wanted to write down my thoughts.I wanted a easy way to begin writing but I was terrible in my schooling. At 57 years old I needed to find a shortcut. This software requires patience but while you train and use it you will learn to write If you stick with it you will be very satisfied. Accessibility is good. .
customer_reviews.author: G. Hinote

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use software that fails to install.
customer_reviews.text: Had great expectations for this software but it failed to install. I don't have time to mess with it so I returned it. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael James

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast your money.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when I first received it. It worked fine when I went away for vacation on June 26th but when I returned on July 6th the program stopped working. No one had access to my computer. Seems kinda fishy that it stopped just after my 30 day window to return. I'm so disappointed in this company. I did some research and Nuance has a very poor satisfaction rating on Consumer Affairs. Practically impossible to get through to technical support. Complete waste of money and my time. Would not recommend at al.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy Nuance products. Their support is pathetic. I bought this product, then upgraded about a year later. Now I find out that I can't download the product to put it on my new machine. Thanks a lot Nuance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would SERIOUSLY consider if it is worth the hassles
customer_reviews.text: So far this product and accompanying microphone headset have been COMPLETELY useless. It keeps freezing or not recognizing speech. There is no easy on-line support to help...only lists and lists or How to Set It Up. TOTALLY frustrated and about to ship it back. It is billed as completely user friendly and I am fairly good at following tech instructions. Finally had to hang it up. Got it for use at work, but it appears that it will require me to scream into the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I would say it interprets about 95%
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I would say it interprets about 95%. Has trouble with N. You do have to proof read, but you would do that anyway. Saves a lot of time eliminating typing errors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll be bragging about your Dragon in no time!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! But for it to work right you have to put the time in to fully appreciate the product. It is very intuitive!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie R. Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Although there are newer versions, I'm still using this version successfully on Windows 10. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: NewMacinBrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: No warranty so glad it never installed~
customer_reviews.text: Tried to install 5 times. Even had to take to a computer repair place and THEY could not get it to work. No idea if it worked or not but now I'm stuck with extra reminant files and a $75 bill to clean it up! Returned it and NO THANKS! No warranty so glad it never installed~
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: High hopes, Zero satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Dragon Premium 13 for Windows 7 PC using MS Office for Home & Student 2010, software just plain doesn't work. I've tested the Koss CS100 microphone on another computer and it works. Dragon completely ignores it. Contacting support is next to impossible. Nuance substitutes user forums for actual support. I've got to find a way to return the product to Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Not for Windows 10,  btw.
customer_reviews.text: Wish that they would state software compatibility on the description. Not Win 10 compatible, but did not know until I got the box...arghhh.
customer_reviews.author: Travelr64

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: This is my second voice program for my computer and this one worked a lot better than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: simi coop

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Terrible , works like broken phone . I have Russian accent and it’s not understood.
customer_reviews.author: Madlen Dye

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.  Buyer beware.  Customer support rude and UNsupportive.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible software. Unintuitive. Customer support the worst. Freezes my computer. I'm a verified buyer. Returned after one day. complete waste of time. Surely there must be other softwares out there that can do same.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: It's a learning curve to say the least. Work great before I moved. Now it does weird things like jumping up and down the page.
customer_reviews.author: NeedMoreBooks

customer_reviews.title: The program assists helping with the  install, Or you may cantact the company for tech assist.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an older version of Dragon NaturallySpeaking that I used to actually write and publish a book. I find the newer version to be much faster and more exact understanding your words and/or comments.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Dragon Performs Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend and he LOVES it! Works really great for people that need to use a computer to write things but don't type well. Hard to go wrong with Dragon Naturally Speaking!
customer_reviews.author: Kim R

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued software
customer_reviews.text: Nuance is discontinuing this software as of January 2019. You will be able to use it, but there will be no updates or service from Nuance.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: For the seriously impaired typists out there!
customer_reviews.text: So like most people here who write a review for the Dragon naturally speaking speech recognition software, I am doing this with my new toy and enjoying every minute of it! My biggest fear is that I will forget how to type! Another great perk about this product is you automatically improve your speaking skills because you're more aware of your intonation and how you project your voice. I highly recommend Dragon naturally speaking!
customer_reviews.author: Michael malzone

customer_reviews.title: Restrictions were not evident before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: While I use Dragon for many tasks including email and spreads sheets,I also add data to an Electronic Medical Record platform. After upgrading to v13, after 15 minutes use, a window opened stating v13 cannot be used in EMRs. (A medical version $1600 apparently is required). In the v13 description this restriction was not revealed and I believe the exclusion of one specific use is censorship.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not capture natural conversational flow
customer_reviews.text: This product does not accurately capture conversational language. I had hoped it would capture both sides of verbal interviews but it translated to the screen less than half of each sentence. It accurately captures my own dictation about 75% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Saede

customer_reviews.title: This is a major improvement over v. 11
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from v. 11 Home to v.13 Premium. This was a significant improvement and well worth the "relatively" minor cost. It's not as fast as I would like ... but that's not the Dragon's fault, since I'm working it hard on a 4GIG computer. When I upgrade the hardware next month, I expect it'll practically fly.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dragon NaturallySpeaking Premium
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to set up and use. And they want to sell you an upgrade instantly. I will use what I bought, Thank you
customer_reviews.author: P. Cox photography

customer_reviews.title: Not any better than older versions in many ways.
customer_reviews.text: This voice recognition doesn't seem to work any better than the older versions. In fact it may be worse and seems rather picky compared to the older versions.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: After learn the commands and with some pracitce works well ...
customer_reviews.text: After learn the commands and with some pracitce works well, particular for someone (like me) with slow hunt and peck typing skills
customer_reviews.author: richard crandall

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: Saves time and energy when writing down family stories and recording information about family memorabilia that I own for my children and grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old version of this years ago and I hated it. This is such an improvement! Easy to install, doesn't crash, and it gets my words right 90% of the time. With my combination accent of Canadian and Down South that's remarkable!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Nuance Dragon NaturallySpeaking Premium 13 (Discontinued)
product_meta.description: Platform:PC Disc| Edition:Premium - Disc w/ Headsetdragon Naturallyspeaking 13 Premium Speech Recognition Software Lets You Accomplish More On Your Computer - Quickly And Accurately - Using Your Voice. Dragon Turns Spoken Words Into Text And Executes Voice Commands Much Faster Than You Can Type So You Can Realise Your Productivity Potential At Work, School Or Home.
feature_bullets: The fastest and most accurate way to interact with your computer; Dragon dramatically boosts your personal productivity and helps you realize your full potential
A personalized, voice driven experience; Dragon gets even more accurate as it learns the words and phrases you use the most, spelling even difficult words and proper names correctly
An intuitive design and helpful tutorials make it easy to get started and easy to master
The ability to create, format and edit documents by voice allows you to think out loud and break through barriers to creativity
Dictation of text anywhere where you normally type within popular applications enables greater productivity and efficient multi tasking

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
